about_the_game:
This is a fast-paced top-down shooting and tower defense game. You need to customize and upgrade your chariot, build defensive structures to protect your base, explore the world and destroy all enemies! Don't forget to come back and defend when the enemy attacks! Can you make it to the end?

Attack



Master the operation of the chariot and destroy all enemies. Explore a variety of chariot module combinations, different enemies have different attack methods, more powerful enemies mean more generous rewards.

Upgrade



Each destroyed enemy drops useful components, bring them back to base to upgrade yourself.


Explore a wide variety of chariot module combinations.

Defense



Enemies don't sit still, and you'll be attacked by increasingly stronger enemies over time. You can build a variety of defensive buildings to defend against enemy attacks.

Explore


Build speed roads and portals to hunt enemies further afield, destroy their bases, and bring back the loot. Balance the time to explore and back to defend, and don't forget to come back and defend before the enemy attacks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 gen 2 or AMD Bulldozer {4 cores)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 gen 2 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
